summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5549 for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Northeast, from the north line of Hayes Park Addition to the south line of Ravenna Park Heights Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 71581, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
